snippet: In challenging conditions, Kevin Stadler shot a one-over-par 72 in the third round of the French Open in Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines and still managed to extend his lead to four strokes over Victor Riu and Thongchai Jaidee.
lead_paragraph: In challenging conditions, Kevin Stadler shot a one-over-par 72 in the third round of the French Open in Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines and still managed to extend his lead to four strokes over Victor Riu and Thongchai Jaidee.
